mapper.sql: CELEBRITY_ID, CELEBRITY_NAME, ANOTHER_NAME, FOREIGN_NAME, NATIONALITY, NATION, CONSTELLATION, BLOOD_TYPE, HEIGHT, BIRTHPLACE, NATIVE_PLACE, ANCESTRAL_HOME, IDENTITY_CARD, CERTIFICATE_CODE, CERTIFICATE_NAME, PROFESSION, COMPANY, REPRESENTATIVE_NAME, ACHIEVEMENT, BIRTHDAY, DEATHDAY, VIDEO_ID_FK, IMAGE_ID_FK, BROWSE_COUNT,OUTLINE, INTRODUCE

CELEBRITY_ID AS celebrityId , CELEBRITY_NAME AS celebrityName , ANOTHER_NAME AS anotherName , FOREIGN_NAME AS foreignName , NATIONALITY AS nationality , NATION AS nation , CONSTELLATION AS constellation , BLOOD_TYPE AS bloodType , HEIGHT AS height , BIRTHPLACE AS birthplace , NATIVE_PLACE AS nativePlace , ANCESTRAL_HOME AS ancestralHome , IDENTITY_CARD AS identityCard , CERTIFICATE_CODE AS certificateCode , CERTIFICATE_NAME AS certificateName , PROFESSION AS profession , COMPANY AS company , REPRESENTATIVE_NAME AS representativeName , ACHIEVEMENT AS achievement , BIRTHDAY AS birthday , DEATHDAY AS deathday , OUTLINE AS outline , INTRODUCE AS introduce , VIDEO_ID_FK AS videoIdFk , IMAGE_ID_FK AS imageIdFk , BROWSE_COUNT AS browseCount
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_CELEBRITYS ( CELEBRITY_ID, CELEBRITY_NAME, ANOTHER_NAME, FOREIGN_NAME, NATIONALITY, NATION, CONSTELLATION, BLOOD_TYPE, HEIGHT, BIRTHPLACE, NATIVE_PLACE, ANCESTRAL_HOME, IDENTITY_CARD, CERTIFICATE_CODE, CERTIFICATE_NAME, PROFESSION, COMPANY, REPRESENTATIVE_NAME, ACHIEVEMENT, BIRTHDAY, DEATHDAY, OUTLINE, INTRODUCE, VIDEO_ID_FK, IMAGE_ID_FK, BROWSE_COUNT ) VALUES ( #{celebrityId}, #{celebrityName}, #{anotherName}, #{foreignName}, #{nationality}, #{nation}, #{constellation}, #{bloodType}, #{height}, #{birthplace}, #{nativePlace}, #{ancestralHome}, #{identityCard}, #{certificateCode}, #{certificateName}, #{profession}, #{company}, #{representativeName}, #{achievement}, #{birthday}, #{deathday}, #{outline}, #{introduce}, #{videoIdFk}, #{imageIdFk}, #{browseCount} )
